verses.text: Now Abram’s wife \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w an|strong="H3205"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Abram, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w prevented|strong="H6113"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w bearing|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*. \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*; perhaps \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w can|strong="H4994"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* family \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1129"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Abram \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w* \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Abram \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* slept \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1404"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2029"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* began \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w despise|strong="H7043"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*.\f + \fr 16:4 \ft Or her mistress became despised in her sight\f*

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Abram, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrong|strong="H2555"\w* \w done|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w into|strong="H8199"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w arms|strong="H2436"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ever \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2029"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w treated|strong="H7043"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w contempt|strong="H7043"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w between|strong="H8199"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.”

“\w Here|strong="H2009"\w*,” said Abram, “\w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* want \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w treated|strong="H6213"\w* Hagar \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w harshly|strong="H6031"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 16:7 \ft Or Angel; also in verses 9, 10, and 11; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized.\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Hagar \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*—\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*.

“\w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w*, \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w*,” \w he|strong="H6440"\w* said, “\w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w going|strong="H3212"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* am running \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w*,” \w she|strong="H6440"\w* replied.

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* told \w her|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w submit|strong="H6031"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w authority|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* added, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7235"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w too|strong="H3808"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w count|strong="H5608"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* proceeded: “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* conceived \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*,\f + \fr 16:11 \ft Ishmael means God hears.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkey|strong="H6501"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w live|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* hostility \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* Hagar \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*,\f + \fr 16:13 \ft Hebrew El-Roi\f*” \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Here|strong="H1988"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w One|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*!”

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w well|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Beer-lahai-roi.\f + \fr 16:14 \ft Beer-lahai-roi means well of the Living One who sees me.\f* \w It|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* located \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w* \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w Bered|strong="H1260"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* Abram \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abram \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w*.

Abram \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w eighty-six|strong="H8084"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.
